title: 帮我看看这个是啥问题？
author: as763875321
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Hey, that tickles! Hehehe!

Time: 14-2-19 下午8:21
Description: Initializing game

replies.author: qiu1995
replies.txt_content: 喜闻乐见高级太阳能出错，楼主删了算了
